attributes.action: Full Disclosure On Contact With Extra-Terrestrials
attributes.additional_details:
It's about time the MoD and government came forward and admitted that they have had contact with Extra-Terrestrials. Daily more and more people are seeing things that simply cannot be explained flying around British airspace and on the ground.
Thousands of people cannot be wrong in what they witness, so it's time to stop keeping us in the dark and open up...
Remember what David Cameron our current Prime Minister said...

"So I would be quite happy to give you a guarantee that if I became Prime Minister I would always be entirely open and frank about these things."
